pricing.title: Plans That Adapt to Your Goal
pricing.subtitle: Choose the ideal plan for your fitness journey. All plans include 30-day guarantee.

q1.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q1.answer: Yes, you can cancel your plan anytime without additional fees. Your access remains active until the end of the paid period.

q2.question: Is there a free trial period?
q2.answer: We offer 7 days free for all plans. No credit card required to start.

q3.question: Can I change plans later?
q3.answer: Sure! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. We adjust the amount proportionally.

q4.question: Do workouts work offline?
q4.answer: Yes, you can download workouts and use offline. Synchronization happens when you connect again.

q5.question: Is there a satisfaction guarantee?
q5.answer: We offer a 30-day guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we return 100% of your money.

q6.question: How does medical support work?
q6.answer: Our Premium and Enterprise plans include monitoring with certified health professionals.

cta.title: Still have questions about which plan to choose?
cta.subtitle: Our team is ready to help you find the perfect plan

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about FitCoach

1.question: How do I start using FitCoach?
1.answer: Download the app, create your account with basic information like age, weight, height and goals. Our AI will create a personalized plan in seconds. You can start with our 7-day free trial.

2.question: How does AI personalize my workouts?
2.answer: Our AI analyzes your biometric data, workout history, preferences, physical limitations and progress in real time. Each session is adapted based on your performance and feedback.

3.question: Do I need equipment to train?
3.answer: Not necessarily! We offer workouts with and without equipment. You can choose bodyweight-only workouts or add equipment that you have available. AI adapts exercises according to your resources.

5.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
5.answer: You can cancel anytime in your account settings. Access continues until the end of the paid period. We don't charge cancellation fees and the process is 100% online.

12.question: Is there a guarantee period?
12.answer: Yes! We offer 7 days free to test all features. If you're not satisfied, cancel before the trial period and you won't be charged.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: Our support team is here to help you.

advisors.title: Advisors
advisors.subtitle: Experts who guide us into the future

ricardo.name: Dr. Ricardo Silva
ricardo.bio: PhD in Artificial Intelligence from MIT, with 15 years of experience in machine learning applied to health. Founder of FitCoach with the mission to democratize access to personalized workouts.

ana.name: Dr. Ana Costa
ana.bio: Medical doctor specializing in sports medicine and clinical nutrition. Responsible for ensuring all protocols are safe and effective.

carlos.name: Carlos Oliveira
carlos.bio: Software engineer specializing in distributed systems and AI. Leads the development of the platform and personalization algorithms.

mariana.name: Mariana Santos
mariana.bio: Product Manager with an MBA in Digital Marketing. Responsible for user experience and product strategy.

pedro.name: Pedro Lima
pedro.bio: Data scientist with a PhD in Statistics. Develops the machine learning algorithms that power personalization.

juliana.name: Juliana Ferreira
juliana.bio: Marketing specialist in growth hacking and branding. Responsible for the brand's growth and communication strategy.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Rules and guidelines for using the FitCoach platform

history.title: Version History
history.description: Select a version to view the specific terms

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.content: By using our services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully. They contain important provisions about your rights and obligations.

s1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
s1.content: By accessing or using FitCoach, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

s2.title: 2. User Account
s2.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password.

s3.title: 3. Subscription Services
s3.content: Some parts of the Service are billed on a subscription basis. You will be billed in advance on a recurring basis. All payments are non-refundable.

s4.title: 4. User Content
s4.content: Our Service allows you to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, videos, or other material. You are responsible for the content you post.

s5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
s5.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of FitCoach and its licensors.

s6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
s6.content: In no event shall FitCoach, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages.

s7.title: 7. Governing Law
s7.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Brazil, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

s8.title: 8. Changes
s8.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time.

terms.contact: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@fitcoach.com

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Full transparency in the handling of your personal data

preferences.title: Your Privacy Preferences
preferences.description: Control how we use your data to improve your experience

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the website to function

analytics.title: Analytics and Improvement
analytics.description: Helps us understand how you use the site

s1.title: 1. Information We Collect
s1.content: We collect information to provide better services to all our users. This includes data provided voluntarily, data collected automatically, and data from third parties when authorized.

s2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
s2.content: We use the information to operate, provide, develop, and improve the services we offer, including workout personalization, customer support, research and analysis, and communication about services.

s3.title: 3. Information Sharing
s3.content: We do not sell personal information. We share information only in the following circumstances: with your consent, for processing by service providers, for legal reasons, or in the event of a business transfer.

s4.title: 4. Data Security
s4.content: We implement robust technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process.

s5.title: 5. Data Retention
s5.content: We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
